name: matelote
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a dish of fish cooked in a sauce that includes onions and wine: Matelote du Rhin is an impressive stew of freshwater fish marinated in white wine. A matelote sauce contains white wine with fish stock. Serve portions of the fish with plenty of the matelotte.
More examplesFewer examplesTench is a river fish with a mild, delicate flavour; often an ingredient in matelote. White wines accompany the matelotes of freshwater fish and the hearty choucroute.Traditional dishes such as matelotte d'anguille, eels braised in a rich red wine sauce, are disappearing from French menus.
